lead_paragraph: Tsuneo Watanabe and two other executives of the Yomiuri Giants will resign to take responsibility for a gambling scandal that has hit Japan's oldest professional baseball team.

headline.print_headline: Yomiuri Giants Executives to Resign Over Gambling Scandal
headline.main: Yomiuri Giants Executives to Resign Over Gambling Scandal
